ModMetaData.name: Just About: Lions And Tigers
ModMetaData.author: HalituisAmaricanous
ModMetaData.description: This mod adds 2 new Xenotype races and 14 Genes and 1 Enemy Faction for rimworld Biotech Requires Biotech to work obviously. LEO: The Leo race is a subspecies of humanoid creatures that have been genetically engineered using a combination of ancient feline gene patterns. They are most effective when working together in a pack, using their coordination and pack tactics to take down even the most formidable opponents. TIGRIS: The Tigris race is a subspecies of humanoid creatures that have been genetically engineered using a combination of ancient feline gene patterns. They are fiercely independent, forming loose societies of hunter gathers, but leverage their natural advantages to live pseudo nomadic lives gainful over planets despite their lack of close knit society. This mod also adds 4 new genes that add new abilities to the feline pawns. Nine Lives: Once a month the pawn will dodge Nine attacks resulting in invisibility, The Gene cannot doge explosives and Gas attacks. Feline Claws: +70% Armor Penetration from all melee attacks. Pride Hunter: Causes +5 mood when hunting and +20 hunting stealth. Adrenaline: Carriers of this gene gains +10% to blood filtration after every kill, stacking an unlimited amount of times until the user sleeps.
